name: Time is Money. Money is Power
name_original: Time is Money. Money is Power
description:
Become to the god of a world invaded by an alternate reality, in this real-time-strategy city builder!

Mutated humans from an alternate reality have come through a portal and destroyed the world around you. You must grow your population, creating gold over time to build new houses and farms, to throw your popualtion at the mutations and take them out once and for all

Will you be the one to destroy the portal and save the world before you? Only time will tell...

Controls

Camera -> Middle mouse / right mouse + drag

Cursor -> WSAD / Arrow keys

Interact -> Space

Select Mode -> 1 / Z

Build Mode -> 2 / X

Fight Mode -> 3 / C

The aim of the game is to build and upgrade your city, growing your population along the way to have enough people to fight off the mutated humans defending the portal!  To grow your population you must have a food income of 2 of more (your food increases by 2 or more each time) along with the given population space.

These stats may be viewed by pressing Q or clicking the top-bar. The current populatio and gold will be visible on the top-bar by default. When the expanded view is shown you may see your max population, your food, your city's health and the time in minutes.

Build Mode

Build mode allows you to construct new buildings across your land. These buildings all produce different effects to your population, ensure to make everything balanced!

As you upgrade your town hall the buildings you have access to will upgrade along side. In the build menu you will end up paying for each upgrade together at the level of the town hall.

To use build mode press 2 / X and click the building selector button in the bottom right corner. Select the building that interests you and a pop up will appear giving more information! Press space in the spot you want to place your building to construct it, given you have enough gold. A holographic version of your building will appear in the cursor if you are able to construct it!

Select Mode

Select mode is used for viewing and upgrading buildings. Hover your cursor and select the building you want to view or upgrade. A panel will appear showing the stats of both and an upgrade button if the upgrade is available. Please note, to upgrade your town hall you must have all buildings to the same level as it! No building left behind!

Fight Mode

To fight enable fight mode and press a building you want to attack. Your population will run towards it and destroy it. Beware, once it is destroyed they will go back to doing their own thing unless you give them more instructions!

They are also unable to find a path, if a fence or other building is in your way, you must destroy that before anything else, be prepared!

Hidden Challenge: Can you find all 3 easter eggs hidden across the map?
